title: Magical Labyrinths Journeys Through Time And Space
description: Magic Labyrinths is already a sensation in Germany. It was published by arsEdition (the German publisher of our Magic Eye books, among others) in spring of 2001, and rights have been sold all over the world. The labyrinths in this book do not exist in reality; they are artistic creations that readers "solve" with their eyes or by tracing with their fingers.People have been fascinated by the magic of labyrinths and mazes for centuries; they exist in almost every part of the world. Cornfield labyrinths have been popping up all over the United States and Europe in the last several years, demonstrating a heightened fascination with the phenomena.
author: Bertrun Jeitner-Hartmann
